verses.text: \w Dare|strong="G5111"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w matter|strong="G4229"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w*, go to \w law|strong="G2919"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* the \w unjust|strong="G0094"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*?

Know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* we shall \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*? how \w much|strong="G3385"\w* \w more|strong="G1065"\w* things that pertain to this \w life|strong="G0982"\w*?

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w judgments|strong="G2922"\w* of things pertaining to this \w life|strong="G0982"\w*, \w set|strong="G2523"\w* \w them|strong="G5128"\w* to judge who are least \w esteemed|strong="G1848"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*.

I \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w your|strong="G5213"\w* \w shame|strong="G1791"\w*. Is \w it|strong="G2076"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*, that there is \w not|strong="G3756"\w* a \w wise|strong="G4680"\w* man \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*? no, \w not|strong="G3761"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* shall be \w able|strong="G1410"\w* to \w judge|strong="G1252"\w* \w between|strong="G3319"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*?

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* goeth to \w law|strong="G2919"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w before|strong="G1909"\w* the \w unbelievers|strong="G0571"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G2235"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* there \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w utterly|strong="G3654"\w* a \w fault|strong="G2275"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* ye \w go|strong="G2192"\w* to \w law|strong="G2917"\w* one \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w*. \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* do \w ye|strong="G0091"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* take \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w*? \w why|strong="G5101"\w* do \w ye|strong="G0650"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \add suffer yourselves to\add* be \w defrauded|strong="G0650"\w*?

\w Nay|strong="G0235"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* do \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w defraud|strong="G0650"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G5023"\w* \add your\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

Know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w unrighteous|strong="G0094"\w* \w shall|strong="G2816"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*? \w Be|strong="G4105"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w deceived|strong="G4105"\w*: \w neither|strong="G3777"\w* \w fornicators|strong="G4205"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w idolaters|strong="G1496"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w adulterers|strong="G3432"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w effeminate|strong="G3120"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* abusers of themselves with \w mankind|strong="G0733"\w*,

\w Nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w thieves|strong="G2812"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w covetous|strong="G4123"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w drunkards|strong="G3183"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3756"\w* \w revilers|strong="G3060"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3756"\w* \w extortioners|strong="G0727"\w*, \w shall|strong="G3756"\w* \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w such|strong="G5023"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* some of \w you|strong="G5100"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* ye are \w washed|strong="G0628"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* ye are \w sanctified|strong="G0037"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* ye are \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

All \w things|strong="G3956"\w* are \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G4851"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w expedient|strong="G4851"\w*: all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* are \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* for \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1850"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* be brought under the \w power|strong="G1850"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w*.

\w Meats|strong="G1033"\w* for the \w belly|strong="G2836"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w belly|strong="G2836"\w* for \w meats|strong="G1033"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="G2673"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G3778"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G5023"\w*. \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* for \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* for the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* for the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w hath|strong="G1453"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will also raise \w up|strong="G1825"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* his \w own|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*.

Know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w bodies|strong="G4983"\w* \w are|strong="G2076"\w* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*? shall \w I|strong="G0142"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w take|strong="G0142"\w* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, and \w make|strong="G4160"\w* \add them\add* the \w members|strong="G3196"\w* of an \w harlot|strong="G4204"\w*? \w God|strong="G3361"\w* \w forbid|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w What|strong="G2228"\w*? know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w joined|strong="G2853"\w* to an \w harlot|strong="G4204"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w*, saith \w he|strong="G5346"\w*, shall \w be|strong="G2071"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* is \w joined|strong="G2853"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w Flee|strong="G5343"\w* \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*. \w Every|strong="G3956"\w* \w sin|strong="G0265"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w without|strong="G1622"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w that|strong="G3588"\w* committeth \w fornication|strong="G4203"\w* \w sinneth|strong="G0264"\w* \w against|strong="G1519"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*.

\w What|strong="G2228"\w*? know \w ye|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* of the \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w* \add which is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* your \w own|strong="G1438"\w*?
